name: Werewolf Tomagatchi
description:
Adopt and care for your little guy, and his dark passanger!

This little Tamagotchi game was made for 2022 Global Game Jam with the prompt: Duality.

Acts similar to a normal Tamagotchi during the day, but turn off the light and your pet gets a little angry, will break and make messes. Keeping them satisfied isn't just subduing your dark side but indulging his interests as well!

Still working on bug fixes, but after the 3 day game jam, going to take a little break!
